title: Eilistraea, The Moonlit Empress (Part 1)
body:
Eilistraea, The Moonlit Empress (Part 1)

Somewhere far away from the Arora world, at a place filled with lush green trees and mountains different kinds of animals were roaming in the surroundings and birds were chirping happily showing the beauty of the nature.

Many elves can be seen walking all around from time to time, but none of the animals attacked on them.

This place is 'Moon Forest', the capital of the 'Elvenshine' the kingdom of the elves.

Moon Forest is located at the centre of the Elvenshine and is one of the safest places in the world.

In the middle of the moon forest stood a giant tree which is thousands of meters high. This is the tree of life, the divine tree of the elves.

Elves and dryads are always at odds with each other because elves have the tree of Life, and dryads have the world tree with them.
